mapper.insert: insert into tb_order ( seller_no, table_no, device_token, order_content ) values ( #{sellerNo}, #{tableNo}, #{deviceToken}, #{orderContent} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_day_adjust where year(day_adjust_date) = year(now()) and month(day_adjust_date) = month(now()) and dayofmonth(day_adjust_date) = dayofmonth(now()) and menu_no = #{menuNo}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_day_adjust ( day_total_number, day_total_sales, day_adjust_date, store_no, store_name, menu_no, menu_name ) values ( #{quantity}, #{dayTotalSales}, sysdate(), (select store_no from tb_menu where menu_no = #{menuNo}), (select s.name from tb_menu m inner join tb_order o on o.order_no = #{orderNo} inner join tb_store s on o.seller_no = s.seller_no where m.menu_no = #{menuNo}), #{menuNo}, (select name from tb_menu where menu_no = #{menuNo}) )
mapper.update: update tb_day_adjust set (day_total_number = (day_total_number + #{quantity}), (day_total_sales = (day_total_sales + #{dayTotalSales})) where year(day_adjust_date) = year(now()) and month(day_adjust_date) = month(now()) and dayofmonth(day_adjust_date) = dayofmonth(now()) and menu_no = #{menuNo}
